.. _changelog:

Changelog
=========

IMAS-MUSCLE3 1.0.0
------------------

Features
''''''''

- Sink actor:             Load data from DBEntry.
- Source actor:           Save data to DBEntry.
- Sink-source actor:      Reactively load specific timeslices from DBEntry.
- Accumulator actor:      Collect separate timeslices into single IDS.
- IMAS-Validator actor:   Validate IMAS data using custom rulesets.
- Visualization actor:    Run-time visualization of simulation.
